snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo asked the State Police and the Human Rights Division to investigate charges that Jewish children in a district serving parts of Orange, Sullivan and Ulster Counties had been harassed.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo says he has directed New York State Police and State Division of Human Rights to investigate allegations of anti-Semitic harassment of children in Pine Bush Central School District.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo asked the State Police and the Human Rights Division to investigate charges that Jewish children in a district serving parts of Orange, Sullivan and Ulster Counties had been harassed.

headline.main: Cuomo Orders Investigations Into Claims of Anti-Semitic Acts in a School District
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Orders Investigations Into Claims Of Anti-Semitic Acts in a School District
